showScoreExcerpt: "It's an ambitious musical...There are so many wonderful things in Wicked that to dismiss it as so many critics have done strikes us as perverse...It has a heart, a brain, and the nerve to have opened on Broadway."

to dismiss it as so many critics have done strikes us as perverse
